data.details: PLCFactory.create_plc awaits plc.initialize() and PLCManager.initialize() calls initialize() again. This can cause duplicate connection attempts/logs and longer startup.
data.fix: Skip re-initialize in PLCManager when returned PLC is already connected (implemented).

message: Added CLI flags for easy PLC mode switching and a one-shot doctor test
Log level can now be set via LOG_LEVEL or --log-level; file path via LOG_FILE or --log-file

data.notes: This improves debuggability without code changes or reconfiguring handlers.
